data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Pohnpei to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pohnpei, Micronesia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Pohnpei, Micronesia today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Pohnpei, Micronesia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Pohnpei, Micronesia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 26,644 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Japanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Pohnpei.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 7,857 believers in Pohnpei against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord, the believers in the state of Pohnpei, Micronesia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

location.name: Pohnpei
location.cities_list: Kolonia, Kolonia Town, Ngatik, Palikir - National Government Center, Madolenihm Municipality Government
